Megaton sensed he had made the right decision to follow this group, he coul=
d smell his donor, he knew that two others were accompanying Megatron. "So =
you have come to greet me yourself." The dragon sensed his destiny aproachi=
ng and knew that it wouldn't be long until he took his rightfull place at t=
he head of the Predacons. "You have brought witnesses to your surrender, I =
suppose you wished to introduce them to your replacement. IAM MEGATON, THE =
NEW RULER OF THE PREDACONS, BOW BEFORE MY MIGHT." The only thing that seeme=
d bigger than this dragon was his ego.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, December 21=
, 2000 9:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Following Megatrons troops.


       Looking =
on the scanners, Tarantulas notices that the large, mysterious 
  bot, Mega=
ton is heading this way. 
        "Megatron, um, First off, Darkmouse refus=
ed our offer and now Megaton 
  is coming this way." He said, looking at th=
e dictator in his throne. 
        "Instruct Quickstrike.....oh wait, he le=
ft....tell Paddletail to try 
  and make some Liquid Energon himself. I bel=
ieve we have the recipie around 
  here somewhere. As for Megaton....Waspin=
ator, Myself, and Aerostreak will 
  talk with him." Megatron said, getting=
 up. 
        Waspinator, Aerostreak, and Megatron all exit the Ice Cave an=
d 
  approach Megaton. 
        eGroups Sponsor
